label: 殿上間
対訳語: Waiting Room of the Imperial Audience Chamber
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: In the southern side room (hisashi) of the Sovereign's Residential Palace (Seiryō-den). Where the Courtiers in Attendance on the Sovereign (Denjōbito) and the High Court Nobles (Kugyō) gather and visited before going into the audience chamber before the Sovereign (Tennō). [廂、清涼殿、殿上人、公卿、天皇]
